verses.verse: For God so loved us, He sent the Savior: For God so loved us, and loves me too.
verses.refrain: Love so unending! I'll sing His praises, God loves His children, loves even me.
verses.verse: He sent the Savior, the blest Redeemer; He sent the Savior to set me free.
He bade me welcome, O word of mercy; He bade me welcome, O voice divine.
Glory and honor, O Love eternal, To Him be given while life shall last.
